entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:49 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
